Package org.lwjgl.llvm

Class LLVMRemarks.Functions

java.lang.Object
org.lwjgl.llvm.LLVMRemarks.Functions
Enclosing class:
LLVMRemarks
public static final class LLVMRemarks.Functions extends Object
Contains the function pointers loaded from LLVMCore.getLibrary().
